sentence.Network_en: She walked with her shoulders back and her nose pointing skyward.

list.abs: the magma connection to the crust is not even , as the crust has pockets where solid rock goes down into the magma just as the crust has mountain ranges thrusting rock skyward .岩浆与地壳连接并不是均匀的，因为地壳有着孔洞，在此处坚固的岩石下沉进入到岩浆里，这和地壳有着山脉，并使岩石向天空伸展的情况是一样的。
the Hawker 731's twin Garrett TFE-731 engines thundered , powering the plane skyward with gut-wrenching force .“猎鹰者“731的“加勒特”TFE一731双引擎轰鸣起来，产生一股强大的动力，推动着飞机向空中飞去。
tourists look on as Old Faithful , Yellowstone National Park's most famous geyser , sends a tower of scaling water skyward .意译：美国地标和国家公园图片。游客看作为老忠实支持者，黄石国家公园最有名的间歇泉，发出了一个尺度水向天空。
when his friends cut the anchor lines , Larry , lifted by the 42 balloons , shot skyward at an astonishing speed .朋友们一切断锚线，拉里就被42个气球拉起，并以惊人的速度射向天际。

entry.def: If you look skyward or skywards, you look up towards the sky.

example.ex: ...people who look skywards at the first sound of an aircraft.
example.tran: 一听到飞机的声响就马上抬头看的人们

means.word_mean: 1. directed toward heaven or the sky;
